item.title: [525] run.bat problems
item.dc:creator: @bunni bunni
item.description:
@bunni wrote:

ok so i run my source run.bat and it comes up and says press any button to continue, i thought it was meant to say starting server blah blah blah anyway this is what is in my source run.bat (i’m using jcscape 525 source)

@echo off title Rslife Start Javaw -Xmx1024m -classpath bin;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar com.rs2hd.Main pauseand then when i open up my client it stops at connecting to update server and this is what is in my client run.bat-

@echo off Start Javaw -Xmx256M client2 pause
someone please help as i really want to get this 525 to work thanks.
sometimes the client just stays white :S
my client is called HD loader
also when i run both run.bat they both just say press any button to continue :S
this is my client2

[code]
